thread.title: Teresita Adler
thread.title_full: Sunday Afternoons reviewed by Teresita Adler

author: Teresita Adler
title: Teresita Adler
text: I purchased the hat to block out the Sun while I play tennis in sunny Cocoa Beach,Fl. The Hat blocks the sun very efficiently but was surprised to find that it also blocks in the heat also. I am very pleased with the hat and use it to walk on the beach also.
